articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Australia and Japan markets slip as Fed decision looms, most Asian markets closed - CNBC
articles.description: Most markets in the region are closed for the Labor Day holiday, except Australia and Japan
articles.content:
Consumer confidence hit its lowest level since mid-2022 in March as fears grew over employment and inflation, the Conference Board reported Tuesday.
The board's main index registered a reading of 97… [+642 chars]

articles.title: As China Unleashes 80,000-Ton Fujian, India’s Ex-Naval Chief Wants France’s Help To Construct Nuke-Powered Aircraft Carrier - EurAsian Times
